DataElement.preferredName: Participant Lymphoma Negation Treating Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates the participant meets the eligibility requirements for participation in a clinical trial with regards to untreated lymphoma.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Lymphoma Negation Treating Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity._A malignant (clonal) proliferation of B- lymphocytes or T- lymphocytes which involves the lymph nodes, bone marrow and/or extranodal sites. This category includes Non-Hodgkin lymphomas and Hodgkin lymphomas._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Providing treatment for._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Property.preferredName: Lymphoma Negation Treating Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A malignant (clonal) proliferation of B- lymphocytes or T- lymphocytes which involves the lymph nodes, bone marrow and/or extranodal sites. This category includes Non-Hodgkin lymphomas and Hodgkin lymphomas.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Providing treatment for.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A malignant (clonal) proliferation of B- lymphocytes or T- lymphocytes which involves the lymph nodes, bone marrow and/or extranodal sites. This category includes Non-Hodgkin lymphomas and Hodgkin lymphomas.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated to support protocol AMC-101 DC  Revised context from NCIP to AMC - smt 9/8/2020
